name: Banished Castle VR
description:
Welcome to Banished Castle VR, the ultimate VR first-person poly-styled dungeon crawler.

Once upon a time, our beautiful castle was stormed by a gang of monsters and creatures. We were hopeless and had to give up the castle. We banished the castle and made it difficult for our people to enter. It became too dangerous. But now we have new powers. New energy. It is up to you to save the once beautiful, exiled castle, so that our people, our faith, will be pure again and recognized worldwide!

Choose your class, go your own way. Enter randomly generated dungeons and places full of mysteries and different creatures. Choose the weapons you need and fight the leader of terror alone or together in co-op mode. It's up to you. How will you free the castle?

Features

Random generated dungeons – Each room is randomly generated and guarantees varied gameplay

Weapon handling – Swords are old-fashioned. How about a magic wand, an ax, a bow or a pistol?

Free movement – Move freely with the touchpad and feel right at home in the action.

Your own style – Choose the weapons and skills you need. Go the way you always wanted to go.

Co-op Multiplayer– Explore together with your friend the dark parts of the closed and share the glory you deserve.

Cloud – Score, friends list, everything is in the cloud for cross-over gaming.

The game is in Early Access. It will be constantly updated, so new features will become available with time.
